install.name: System - myApiConnect
install.author: Thomas Welton
install.description: myApiConnect system plugin - Imports the Facebook PHP and Javascript libraries and renders any FBML inside the page. This is a required plugin for all other myApi products.

param.name: appId
param.label: Facebook Application ID
param.description: The Application key provided when creating the facebook application associated with this website.

param.name: secret
param.label: Facebook Secret Key
param.description: The secret key provided when creating the facebook application associated with this website.
